message: Hello Geeks, if you are interested in Azure Active Directory (for Enterprises or developers) and you have had lingering questions you want to ask, the Azure AD team is doing an AMA (ask me Anything) on Thursday... Details here if you want to ask or just read some of the anwsers.
story: Tarek Dawoud shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: First ever Azure AD Ask Me Anything (AMA)! March 9th, 10am – 1pm Pacific
caption: blogs.technet.microsoft.com
description: Howdy folks, I’m excited to announce that we’re going to host our first ever Azure AD Ask Me Anything session! When: March 9, 2017 from 10:00 am to 1:00 pm Pacific Time. You’ll be able to access the AAD AMA when it goes live on March 8. What’s an AMA session? We’ll have folks from
